      <span id="bc_guide_name">
       Who Controls Your Digital World?

    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Who Controls Your Digital World? &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Oct 27, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/digitalworld
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">
      <span class="iprint">
       <a href="/print_content.php?pid=571542&amp;sid=4713071&amp;mode=g" title="View in a format suitable for printers and screen readers">
        Print Guide
       </a>
      </span>
     </span>
     <span class="rssupdatelink" style="padding:0px 10px; border-left:dotted thin #666666;">
      <span class="irss">
       <a href="#" onclick="return showDlg('RSS Updates','/process_content.php?m=rssupdates&amp;iid=3322&amp;pid=571542&amp;sid=4713071&amp;gid=0&amp;uid=63913',0)" title="Subscribe to Updates via RSS">
        RSS Updates
       </a>
      </span>
     </span>
    </div>

         Home
        </span>
       </a>
      </li>
     </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="stitle" id="guide_tab_title_bar">
     <table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" valign="top">
      <tr>
       <td align="left" width="65%" height="23" nowrap="nowrap">
        <span id="guide_tab_title_bar_page_name">
         Home
        </span>
        <span id="guide_tab_title_bar_page_print" class="font11">
         <span class="iprint">
          <a href="/print_content.php?pid=571542&amp;sid=4713071" title="View in a format suitable for printers and screen readers">
           Print Page
          </a>
         </span>
        </span>
       </td>
       <td align="right" style="white-space:nowrap;">
        <span class="lgsearch">
        </span>
        <form method="post" name="homesearch" style="display:inline;">
         <!--labels to help with accessibility -->
         <label for="searchs" style="display:none;">
          Search Text
         </label>
         <label for="what" style="display:none;">
          Search Type
         </label>
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
          <tr>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_label" class="lgsearch_item">
             &nbsp;&nbsp;Search:&nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_field" class="lgsearch_item">
             <input type="text" class="searchField" name="searchs" id="searchs" onkeypress="return handleEnterSearch(event,'homesearch','customSearch()');" />
             &nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_dropdown" class="lgsearch_item">
             <select id="what" name="what" class="dropdownform" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;">

              </option>

               All Guides
              </option>
             </select>
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_button" class="lgsearch_item" style="padding-right:2px;">
             <button dojotype="dijit.form.Button" type="button" name="fb" onclick="customSearch();" style="font-size:10px;">
              Search
             </button>
            </div>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </form>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17366108">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17366108">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17366108">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Resources to Generate Topic Ideas
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17366108">
          <ul>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Course Topic Suggestions
             <br />
            </strong>
            <a href="http://fys142f16.blogs.muhlenberg.edu/topic-suggestions/">
             http://fys142f16.blogs.muhlenberg.edu/topic-suggestions/
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Encompass Search
            </strong>
            <br />
            Use the search box on the
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
             library homepage
            </a>
            or
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch">
             http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch
            </a>
            <br />
            Search on a known book title to browse its summary, table of contents, and subject headings.&nbsp; Alternately, search on keywords describing a broad topic area to browse for more narrow topic ideas.
            <br />
            <br />
           </li>
           <li>
            <strong>
             News Websites
            </strong>
            <ul>
             <li>
              Google News: Technology
              <a href="https://news.google.com/news/section?pz=1&amp;cf=all&amp;ned=us&amp;topic=tc&amp;siidp=60317a7d160d540994f3b15a2681daff7773&amp;ict=ln">
               <br />
               https://news.google.com/news/section?pz=1&amp;cf=all&amp;ned=us&amp;topic=tc&amp;siidp=60317a7d160d540994f3b15a2681daff7773&amp;ict=ln
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              New York Times: Technology
              <br />
              <a href="http://www.nytimes.com/pages/technology/index.html">
               http://www.nytimes.com/pages/technology/index.html
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              Slate: Technology
              <br />
              <a href="http://www.slate.com/articles/technology.html">
               http://www.slate.com/articles/technology.html
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
            <ul>
             <li>
              Washington Post: Technology
              <a href="http://www.washingtonpost.com/business/technology">
               <br />
               http://www.washingtonpost.com/business/technology
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              Yahoo News: Technology
              <br />
              <a href="http://news.yahoo.com/tech/">
               http://news.yahoo.com/tech/
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt17366108" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17366120">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17366120">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17366120">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Resources to Find Scholarly Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17366120">
          <p>
           <em>
            Learn more:
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=4047073">
             What is Scholarly?
            </a>
           </em>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Scholarly Articles
            </strong>
            <ul>
             <li>
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <br />
              A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including media and communication. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
              <strong>
               Check for Full Text
              </strong>
              <span>
               &nbsp;buttons
              </span>
              &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
              <br />
              <br />
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ufh">
               Communication&nbsp;and Mass Media Complete
               <br />
              </a>
              Premier database of scholarly and trade journals and books in media and communication and related areas. Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the
              <strong>
               Check for Full Text
              </strong>
              <span>
               &nbsp;buttons
              </span>
              &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
              <br />
              <br />
             </li>
             <li>
              Use the
              <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=356743">
               Subject Guides
              </a>
              to find other recommended databases for your more specific topic area.
              <br />
              <br />
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Scholarly Books
            </strong>
            <ul>
             <li>
              Encompass Search
              <br />
              Location: Use the search box on the
              <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
               library homepage
              </a>
              or
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch">
               http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch
              </a>
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discovery">
               <br />
              </a>
              Encompass Search finds information by searching through a massive collection of books, scholarly journals, newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more.
              <em>
               <strong>
                To find only books
               </strong>
              </em>
              , use the Books limit on the left sidebar of your search results page. Many items will be in Trexler Library; note the call number and status of the item to check its location and availability. For items not in Trexler Library, use the Interlibrary Loan to request a copy from another library.
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt17366120" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18470245">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18470245">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18470245">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18457468">
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             why to cite your sources
            </strong>
            and
            <strong>
             how to avoid plagiarism
            </strong>
            , see the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3856388">
             Get Started with Library Research: Cite Sources
            </a>
            guide.&nbsp;
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             APA Style
            </strong>
            , see:
            <ul>
             <li>
              <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/library/media/content,assets/library/docs/apa_example.pdf">
               APA Style
              </a>
              (Trexler Library, Muhlenberg College)
              <br />
              Examples of in-text and reference list citation formatting.
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/section/2/10/">
               APA Style
              </a>
              (Purdue Online Writing Lab)
              <br />
              General orientation to APA Style, plus examples of paper and citation formatting.
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://writing.wisc.edu/Handbook/DocAPA.html">
               APA Documentation Guide
              </a>
              (University of Wisconsin)
              <br />
              General orientation to APA Style, plus examples of paper and citation formatting.
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
             Zotero
            </a>
            <br />
            "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources." Download instructions and help available on the site.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt18457468" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4713071" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>

         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18470215">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need Help with Your Research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117745">
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Jen Jarson
           </b>
           <br />
           Social Sciences Reference Librarian
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3552
           <br />
           email: jarson@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
